system.description:
You have unleashed your true potential and become that which you always dreamed of. You have unlocked your Final Form.

REQUIREMENTS

To become The Final Form, you have earned the Fellowship of a Dragon.

The Final Form starts with the Move A Level Beyond.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-final-form.Item.zeKfDWChz13N7zD5]{A LEVEL BEYOND}

CUSTOM MOVES

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-final-form.Item.C4a8WDcE1YtJUgPa]{DRAGONFIRE}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-final-form.Item.Gp7yCXfmfT7LKDYH]{DOMINANCE}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-final-form.Item.J2aJihSrD6HHf4uE]{PYROMANIA}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-final-form.Item.uFAa0WZdBVlV0EWH]{THAT WASN'T EVEN MY FINAL FORM}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-final-form.Item.bAogniBiJ75wdfid]{TRUE POWER}

advancements.name: Take the Dragon's Core Moves (Champion of Fire, Dragon Magic, and Through The Fire And The Flames). If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
